description.english: Defeat 20 enemies using flame-type weapons or skills

description.english: Assassinate 14 people without being spotted by the enemy in the “Surrounded” infiltration mission
description.german: Meucheln Sie in der Infiltrationsmission „Umzingelt“ 14 Gegner, ohne vom Feind entdeckt zu werden
description.french: Assassiner 14 personnes sans être repérée par l'ennemi dans la mission d'infiltration « Cernée »
description.italian: Uccidi 14 soldati senza essere avvistata nella missione d'infiltrazione "Circondata"
description.koreana: “포위” 잠입 임무에서 적에게 들키지 않고 14명 암살하기
description.schinese: 在"危机四伏"潜入任务中连续暗杀14名敌人
description.tchinese: 在"四面楚歌"潛入任務中連續暗殺14名敵人
description.russian: Убить 14 человек без обнаружения врагом в миссии внедрения «В окружении»
description.japanese: “四面楚歌”の潜入ミッションで、敵に一度も発見されず14人暗殺する
description.brazilian: Assassine 14 pessoas sem ser avistada pelo inimigo na missão de infiltração "Cercada"
description.latam: Elimina a 14 personas sin que el enemigo te descubra en la misión de infiltración Sin salida
